scripts.start: npm run dev:1 && npm run dev:2 && npm run dev:3 && npm run dev:ico
scripts.dev:1: set HTTP_PORT=3001 & set P2P_PORT=5001 && start npm run dev
scripts.dev:2: set HTTP_PORT=3002 & set P2P_PORT=5002 & set PEERS=ws://localhost:5001 && start npm run dev
scripts.dev:3: set HTTP_PORT=3003 & set P2P_PORT=5003 & set PEERS=ws://localhost:5001,ws://localhost:5002 && start npm run dev
scripts.dev:ico: set HTTP_PORT=3000 && set P2P_PORT=5000 && set PEERS=ws://localhost:5001,ws://localhost:5002,ws://localhost:5003 && start npm run ico
